channel.title: Advanced Texture Practice (scratched black metal crate)
channel.description: Practicing photoshop + texture + normal mapping. It's 78 faces. [u][b]3 Second render[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2cyfvrb.png[/img] [b][u]Texture unmapped to model (100% made by me)[/u][/b] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/jrb7lu.png[/img]

item.title: Advanced Texture Practice (scratched black metal crate)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Timberpig., post:10, topic:370236”]hell yeah! i love gamecube.
anyone play super mario sunshine or sonic adventure 2 battle?

how can you like blender 2.5??? omg i cant even navigate it.[/quote]
How can you like 2.49? omg i cant even navigate it.

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:8, topic:370236”]Hated blender because of UI. Tried out 2.55 (I think), and fell in love. So much more organized. Going to make a simple cube to rival yours. ;D Some may find it funny. Here it is. Gotta get used to materials now.
[/quote]GAMECUBE!!! XD

item.title: Advanced Texture Practice (scratched black metal crate)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“Timberpig., post:2, topic:370236”]not to shabby! how is it 78 faces? you could get the same the same effect with a regular box and a small stack of normal maps.
the tex is great though, (if you created it by hand)[/quote]Yea i extruded the thing because the normal maps wouldn’t be equally hard edged.

Read full topic
